mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id, a.icon, a.code, a.title, a.path, a.status, a.sort, a.created
mapper.select:
SELECT ,a.id as menu_key,a.id as menu_value FROM b_menu a
and a.id=#{ id }
and a.parent_id=#{ parentId }
and a.icon LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ icon }, '%')
and a.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ code }, '%')
and a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ title }, '%')
and a.path LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ path }, '%')
and a.status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ status }, '%')
and a.sort LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ sort }, '%')
and a.created LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ created }, '%')
order by a.created,a.sort desc

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM b_menu m LEFT JOIN b_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ar.role_id FROM b_account_role ar where ar.account_id = #{accountId})
order BY m.created,m.sort ASC
SELECT m.* FROM b_menu m LEFT JOIN b_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.created,m.sort ASC
SELECT m.*,m.id as menu_key,m.id as menu_value FROM b_menu m ORDER BY m.created,m.sort ASC

select m.*,m.id as menu_key,m.id as menu_value from b_organization_menu om left join b_menu m on m.id = om.menu_id
and m.id=#{ id }
and m.parent_id=#{ parentId }
and m.icon LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ icon }, '%')
and m.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ code }, '%')
and m.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ title }, '%')
and m.path LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ path }, '%')
and m.status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ status }, '%')
and m.sort LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ sort }, '%')
and m.created LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ created }, '%')
order by m.created desc
